channel.title: Lounge Brasil
channel.itunes:subtitle: Lounge music spiced with brazilian flavour
channel.itunes:author: Lounge Brasil Podcast

item.title: Lounge Brasil Cafe - OXALA
item.description: SET LIST 1 - Oxala Oxal (Hoping) - Madredeus 2 - All is Full of Love - Bjork 3 - Zé Do Caroço [Live] - Seu Jorge 4 - Chegar em Mim - Ceu 5 - Somebody That I Used To Know (feat Kimbra) official video - Gotye 6 - Come Home - Yael Naim 7 - Crazy (with Abigail Bailey) - UnClubbed 2 8 - Angoli di Cielo - Tiromancino 9 - Smooth Jazz - Sambox 10- Justify My Love - Purple Avenue 11- Downtown Tazacorte - De Phazz 12- Summertime - Chris Coco

item.title: Lounge Brasil Cafe - CHANGE !
item.description:
All over this website you can find the Donate botons. We appreciate all support received. Thank you very much Rico

SET LIST 1 - E lucevan le stelle (puccini) - Tosca 2 - As The Rush Comes (Gabriel & Dresden Chillout Mix) - Motorcycle 3 - Thea - Mensch 4 - Welcome To The Hotel - The Winston Giles Orchestra 5 - Expecting Lightness - DJ Stephane DeLucia 6 - Inhaler - Hooverphonic 7 - Eu Pisei na Pedra - ChicoCorrea&ElectronicBand 8 - How Insensitive (Original Mix) - Suntrust 9 - Coffee Talk - Jazzanova 10- The sun - Coco Steel & Lovebomb 11- Sem contencao - Bebel Gilberto 12- Beautiful - Late Night Alumni

item.title: Lounge Brasil Cafe - Happy New Year
item.description:
SET LIST

1 - Jazz master (Kruder & Dorfmeister sessions) - Alex Reece 2 - Oxala TelepopMix (TelepopMusik) - Madredeus 3 - Can you feel that? - Smoke City 4 - Mr. Hrundi´s Holiday (Karminsky Mix) - Ursula 1000 5 - All is full of love (Plaid mix) - Björk 6 - Life in the Rain - Quantic 7 - Trash Box - De Phazz 8 - El Lado Oscuro de Mi Compadre - Nortec Collective 9 - End Theme - Morcheeba 10- CENARIO (feat. Ed Motta & Lino Crizz) (Da Lata Remix) - Mondo Grosso 11- Feel Your Spirit Calling [Afterlife Lounge Remix] - Moloko 12- Talking One Language (Anniversary Mix) - Vargo 13- Silence (Album Version) - Delerium feat. Sarah McLachlan 14- Orson - Nuspirit Helsinki 15- Almost Sweet - Yonderboi 16- Acid Jazz - London Funk Allstars - Trip Hop (DJ Krush Remix) 17- Sunday Morning - Velvet Underground
